snippet: Someone inside the Seattle cafe where a gunman opened fire on Wednesday threw stools at him, allowing others to run to safety, the police said.
abstract: Seattle police say unidentified man threw stools at Ian Lee Stawicki during his shooting rampage at a cafe, allowing two or three people to flee.
lead_paragraph: Someone inside the Seattle cafe where a gunman opened fire on Wednesday threw stools at him, allowing others to run to safety, the police said.

headline.seo: Washington: Man In Cafe Called a Hero During Shooting
headline.main: Washington: Man in Cafe Called a Hero During a Deadly Rampage
headline.print_headline: Washington: Man In Cafe Called a Hero During a Deadly Rampage
